TopicTitle: How do you build the Space Shuttle's OMS

Articles.Content: I did this to see how you do the OMS pods. If you don't want your designs to be copied just don't post it.

If I was trying to make an accurate Space Shuttle replica just using stock parts, I would try either the Thud engine or those XM-50 air intake thingies (the F-16 looking one) with some Puff monopropellant engines clipped inside them.
I use FLT-200s, Type-B nosecones, and Terriers, and then Offset the whole thing into the fuselage close to the engines.
